text: John Berlinger Breaux (; born March 1, 1944) is an American attorney and retired politician. He was a United States Senator from Louisiana from 1987 until 2005. He was also a member of the US House of Representatives from 1972 to 1987. He was a conservative Democrat. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Louisiana Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Louisiana Category:Businesspeople from Louisiana Category:People from Crowley, Louisiana
title: John Breaux
